title: FS: Baker, Lajoie, Pattee Back Stamps
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: FS: Baker, Lajoie, Pattee Back Stamps
posts.post_content:
Starting to thin out my collection and have a couple of back stamps available.

PSA 3 “FF Baker” Home Run Baker (neat “Baker” on Baker card)
PSA 3 “F. Scott Fitzgerald” Pattee SOLD
PSA 4 “star” Nap throwing SOLD

Price includes USPS Priority post paid. Please email me with interest and for pictures, as I’m having some trouble uploading the photo files.

Thanks,
Eric
(jennings.eric@gmail.com)

I’ll take lajoie


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Thanks for the sale- I appreciate the addition to my collection- I enjoy the story of the F Scott Fitzgerald stamp.
Just got the Lajoie -- great card, great deal!  Thanks!!!
